title: CLASSY Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Analog Classy watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design. Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)★ Date, month ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewMore•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this modern and classy piece of smart watch making. This analog watch face for Android Wear takes elements of classic timepieces and combines them with futuristic smartwatch functionality and design.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog and Digital dial)
★ Customizable text logos in background (via companion app)
★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)
★ Date, month
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal view
More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: Fantastic. Realistic looking watch face. One suggestion - for watches with the "flat tire" on the bottom the numeral 6 is not fully visible. I suggest moving the digital dial to the bottom and to enhance numeral 9.
Still one of the best! Thanks for this fantastic watch face, it's still one of my favorites that I keep coming back to. The solution for fixing the options not working did the trick! Thanks!
Nice one! All black and classy, indeed. Just two suggestions: (1) get a nicer font for the digital time and the date, (2) give the possibility to hide the digital clock and/or the date.
Best looking watch face I found! Deserves the money!
Great app! Easy-to-use and powerful, indeed
recentChanges: - Minimal dimmed mode to extend battery life
- Day of the week enabler via companion app
